title.narrative: 40C/5 ER 8: Increased learning opportunities for crisis-affected populations, including refugees, internally displaced persons and migrants, as well as persons with learning challenges, including disabilities

description.narrative: The Section of Education for Migration, Displacement and Emergencies (EME) will ensure participation in global coordination mechanisms for education in emergencies and strive to ensure UNESCO's alignment with overall emergency response. In full alignment with SDG4, the Section aims to support Member States in strengthening the responsiveness and resilience of education systems to meet the needs of children, youth and adults affected by crisis, including refugees and Internally Displaced People (IDPs) and strive for gender equality.
